sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings! Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name

 

Dear ${requested for},

 

Thank you for your request. Your request of The ${item_type} is been recieved and our support team will be looking at it. Once it has been completed , we will get in touch with you as soon as possible. 

 

Kind regards,

 

 

Wellbeing Center Team

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings! Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name

 

Dear ${requested for},

 

Thank you for your request. Your request of The ${item_type} is been recieved and our support team will be looking at it. Once it has been completed , we will get in touch with you as soon as possible. 

 

Kind regards,

 

 

Wellbeing Center Team
